altername_name: Tsukihime -A piece of blue glass moon- [Limited Edition]
Tsukihime A piece of blue glass moon
月姫 -A piece of blue glass moon-
name: Tsukihime: A piece of blue glass moon
overview: Tsukihime" is a full-length biographical visual novel published by TYPE-MOON in 2000. The story, centers on the main character, Shiki Tono, who has the ability to see the fragile lines of things, or "lines of death," which has fascinated many people since its distribution. This "Tsukihime" has been reborn as "Tsukihime-Apieceofblueglassmoon-" by Kinoko Nasu, Takashi Takeuchi, and the rest of the TYPE-MOON staff. [CERO age rating: 18 years old or older only].
